amendment.description: To create a point of order against legislation that would use tax dollars to censor publicly-funded climate science.

action.text: Amendment SA 944 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 944 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 123.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 944.

Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Nelson. (consideration: CR S1968-1969, S2006-2007; text: CR S1968) To create a point of order against legislation that would use tax dollars to censor publicly-funded climate science.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 944 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 49. Record Vote Number: 123.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Nelson.
